Al Franken.label: Al Franken

Benjamin Wade.label: Benjamin Wade

Books: When Every Moment Counts What You Need to Know about Bioterrorism from the Senate's Only Doctor
Good People Beget Good People A Genealogy of the Frist Family

Chris Dodd.label: Chris Dodd

Elizabeth Dole.label: Elizabeth Dole

Fred Thompson.label: Fred Thompson

Anthony Kennedy was a United States Senator from Maryland, serving from 1857 to 1863. He was the brother of United States Secretary of the Navy John P. Kennedy.

Eugene Hale was a Republican United States Senator from Maine.
